thread.title: Laura and Jason Kenny announce pregnancy with adorable cycling-themed photo
thread.title_full: Laura and Jason Kenny announce pregnancy with adorable cycling-themed photo

author: Fiona Simpson
title: Laura and Jason Kenny announce pregnancy with adorable cycling-themed photo
text:
Tuesday 14 February 2017 21:56 GMT Click to followThe Evening Standard Expectant parents: Laura and Jason Kenny are expecting their first baby (Bryn Lennon/Getty Images) 
Four-time Olympic champion Laura Kenny is expecting her first baby with six-time gold medallist husband Jason Kenny , her agent has confirmed. 
The 24-year-old announced the news with an adorable snap posted on Instagram which showed the couple‚Äôs bikes next to a child‚Äôs bicycle. 
Britain‚Äôs most successful female Olympian then tweeted the picture alongside a simple heart emoji. 
Jason replied with a cheeky shot of a pamphlet featured in an episode of The Simpson‚Äôs entitled ‚ÄúSo you‚Äôve ruined your life‚Äù. A post shared by Laura Kenny (@laurakenny31) on Feb 14, 2017 at 12:02pm PST 
The pair, who married in September last year, were inundated with congratulations from fans and peers after their announcement following a 12-week scan. 
Mrs Kenny‚Äôs teammate Dani King wrote on Twitter: ‚ÄúBest news ever.‚Äù @LauraKenny31 I wondered why this leaflet came through the post... pic.twitter.com/OBSY9DRNlj ‚Äî Jason Kenny (@JasonKenny107) February 14, 2017 BEST NEWS EVER ‚ù§Ô∏èüë∂üèª https://t.co/EdkI51VXmN ‚Äî Dani King (@DaniKing1) February 14, 2017 
The couple's agent Luke Lloyd-Davies told the Standard: "I can confirm that Laura Kenny is indeed pregnant and that she, Jason and their respective families are absolutely thrilled and delighted with the news. 
"They very much appreciate all the kind wishes and messages of support that they have received already." More about:
